name: Kumano Faces Kakkazan // Etching of Kumano
type_line: Enchantment — Saga // Enchantment Creature — Human Shaman

card_faces.name: Kumano Faces Kakkazan
card_faces.oracle_text:
(As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter.)

II — When you cast your next creature spell this turn, that creature enters the battlefield with an additional +1/+1 counter on it.
III — Exile this Saga, then return it to the battlefield transformed under your control.
card_faces.printed_text:
（于此传纪进战场时及于你抓牌步骤后，加一个学问指示物。）

II — 本回合中，当你施放你的下一个生物咒语，该生物进战场时上面额外有一个+1/+1指示物。
III — 放逐此传纪，然后将它在你的操控下移回战场且已转化。

card_faces.name: Etching of Kumano
card_faces.oracle_text:
Haste

敏捷
如果本回合中受过由你操控之来源伤害的生物将死去，则改为将它放逐。
card_faces.flavor_text: 许多神明前来求索熊野自己也不知道的秘密，然而全都无功而返。

If a creature dealt damage this turn by a source you controlled would die, exile it instead.
card_faces.printed_text:
Prisa.
Si una criatura que recibió daño este turno de una fuente que controlas fuera a morir, en vez de eso, exíliala.
card_faces.flavor_text: Muchos kami fueron a exigirle un secreto que él desconocía, y ninguno regresó.
